vision.notes: Present in epigean species; may be reduced or absent in hypogean (cave-dwelling) species. Limited data available on specific visual capabilities.

mechanoreception.notes: Likely present, enabling detection of water currents and substrate vibrations for navigation and prey detection. Common in aquatic isopods.

chemoreception.notes: Likely present, used for locating food sources and mates in the aquatic environment. Common in aquatic crustaceans.
